attributes.action: Stop Hospital Closures and the systematic dismantling of the NHS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that the NHS cannot properly cope now, we call upon the Government to stop all cuts to services but to initiate severe cuts to the top bureaucracy; cessation of the use of Business Consultants and to simplify the administration system of paperwork. We want our Taxes spent on services, not bureaucracy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
